languages.text: "Поступок истинно мудро{mf|го|й} правител{mf|я|ьницы}, что заботится о безопасности сердца своей империи".
"The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Поступок истинно мудро{mf|го|й} правител{mf|я|ьницы}, что заботится о безопасности сердца своей империи".

traits.locale_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} empire."
"The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} empire."
"The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} empire."

"The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."
"The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

languages.text: "Die Entscheidung {mf|eines umsichtigen Herrschers, dem|einer umsichtigen Herrscherin, der} die Sicherheit im Herzen {mf|seines|ihres} Protektorats am Herzen liegt."
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entscheidung {mf|eines umsichtigen Herrschers, dem|einer umsichtigen Herrscherin, der} die Sicherheit im Herzen {mf|seines|ihres} Protektorats am Herzen liegt."

languages.text: « Une décision digne d'{mf|un souverain prudent soucieux|une souveraine prudente soucieuse} de préserver la sécurité du cœur de son protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Une décision digne d'{mf|un souverain prudent soucieux|une souveraine prudente soucieuse} de préserver la sécurité du cœur de son protectorat. »

languages.text: «Una decisión propia de {mf|un|una} gobernante {mf|sensato|sensata} que se preocupa por la seguridad del corazón de su protectorado».
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «Una decisión propia de {mf|un|una} gobernante {mf|sensato|sensata} que se preocupa por la seguridad del corazón de su protectorado».

languages.text: 「ご自身の保護領の心からの安全を気遣われる、誠に慎重な支配者らしいご判断です」
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「ご自身の保護領の心からの安全を気遣われる、誠に慎重な支配者らしいご判断です」

languages.text: “只有真正关心领地的统治者，才会做出如此审慎的决定。”
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “只有真正关心领地的统治者，才会做出如此审慎的决定。”

languages.text: "Protektorasının merkezindeki güvenliği önemseyen, hakikaten ihtiyatlı bir hükümdarın vereceği türden bir karar."
languages.original_text: "The decision of a truly prudent ruler who cares for the safety of the heart of {mf|his|her} protectorate."
